name: .ES3 File Extension
summary: Learn about .ES3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ES3 file is a saved game created by tobspr Games Kiwi Clicker. It contains data a player can use to resume an in-progress game.

content: Kiwi Clicker is a video game in which players click their mouse to manage a kiwi bird production facility. During the game, players can choose to save their progress. Doing so creates a new ES3 file, which the player can use to resume their saved game at a later time.
The game stores ES3 files in the following directory:

instructions: You can resume the saved game an ES3 file contains in Kiwi Clicker (Windows). To do so, place the file in the following directory:
Then, open Kiwi Clicker and resume the saved game your ES3 file contains.
